description.ko: 심해의 빛과 압력의 춤 속을 움직이는, 심연의 투명한 영혼.
description.en: A transparent spirit of the abyss, moving through a dance of light and pressure in the deep.

prompt: A majestic sea dragon composed entirely of hyper-realistic fluid dynamics, weaving through a forest of glowing thermal vents. Detailed caustic patterns are projected onto the dragon's translucent skin and the sea floor. Focus on deep-sea translucency, rising bubble clusters, and the intricate dance of liquid light (#40E0D0, #000080). 8k, Octane Render, raytraced caustics. Volumetric underwater lighting and subsurface scattering create a peaceful yet mysterious atmosphere in the midnight ocean.
